Discovery

Discover Your Ideal Website with User Fusion

In the fast-paced realm of B2B marketing, a strategic approach is essential—no spontaneous leaps here. Your website is a crucial business asset, and at User Fusion, we're committed to crafting not just any website, but the right one for your goals.

workshops & meetings

5 + Hours

Research, Analysis and Prototyping

16 + Hours

A properly thought out, fully actionable project blueprint

1 Project Blueprint

Our Discovery Process

Building Foundations for Success

Through 2-5 targeted video calls or face-to-face meetings, we dive deep into your business, products, services, market, and customers. This, combined with thorough research, allows us to:

  • Define clear project goals and objectives.
  • Understand your target audience through detailed user personas.
  • Determine content requirements and address technical specifications.
  • Analyze the competitive landscape for inspiration and unique selling points.
  • Respect your budget and timeline.

This comprehensive discovery process sets the stage for a successful online presence and ensures your website truly represents your business, driving remarkable results.

Who Needs to Be Involved?

Our A-team, consisting of seasoned web professionals, collaborates with key stakeholders on your end. We require input from individuals responsible for marketing, sales, service delivery, and support to ensure a holistic understanding of your organization.

Key Deliverables

Following extensive consultations and research, we present:

  • An audit of your current website, outlining strengths and weaknesses.
  • A clearly defined blueprint for your new website, including goals, target market specifics, technical features, sitemap, user journeys, key templates, wireframes, and an SEO migration checklist.

This blueprint serves as a comprehensive plan for a successful website, even if you choose not to proceed with User Fusion for the build.

Deliverables

  • Current Website Audit
  • Sitemap
  • Wireframes
  • Goal Setting
  • Technical Specification
  • Detailed Costs & Timeline

Moving Forward

Should you decide to proceed, we offer a detailed cost estimate and proposal for building your new website. The cost of the Discovery package is deducted from your project total, showcasing our commitment to your success.

Take the first step toward a brighter future for your website by booking an intro call with one of our digital strategists today!
